# Personal Finance Tracker

[![Chilicorn sponsored](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](http://spiceprogram.org/oss-sponsorship)

This is a sample app that I'm building [live on Twitch](https://twitch.tv/hamatti). It's a monorepo full-stack application with Django backend and React frontend.

The app will allow you to add your expenses into a simple form and view your spent filtered by different categories.

## Stream Schedule

I stream on **Saturday 5-8pm UTC+3**.

First stream will happen on **September 28th** at [https://twitch.tv/hamatti](https://twitch.tv/hamatti).
